scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run scss && npm run build-js && npm run copy
scripts.clear: rm -r dist/ && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/images && mkdir dist/js
scripts.build-js: npm run build-index && npm run build-our-services
scripts.copy: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-images
scripts.watch: nodemon -e scss,html,js --watch src/ --ignore dist/ --exec 'npm run scss && npm run build-js && npm run copy-html'
